metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

Artificial Music Intelligence
Can an algorithm compose better music than a human?
content.html: Can an algorithm compose better music than a human?

content.text: David Cope is a former professor of music at the University of Santa Cruz (California).
content.html: David Cope is a former professor of music at the University of Santa Cruz (California).

content.text: For over 30 years, David Cope has been developing Emmy or EMI (Experimental Musical Intelligence), an algorithm to compose music in the style of famous composers.
content.html: For over 30 years, David Cope has been developing Emmy or EMI (Experimental Musical Intelligence), an algorithm to compose music in the style of famous composers.

content.text: Bach, Larson, or EMI?
In a test performed by professor Douglas Hofstadter of the University of Oregon, a pianist performed three musical pieces in the style of Bach:
content.html: In a test performed by professor Douglas Hofstadter of the University of Oregon, a pianist performed three musical pieces in the style of Bach:

content.text: Dr. Larson was hurt when the audience concluded that his piece was written by EMI.
content.html: Dr. Larson was hurt when the audience concluded that his piece was written by EMI.

content.text: He felt better when the listeners decided that the piece composed by EMI was a genuine Bach.
content.html: He felt better when the listeners decided that the piece composed by EMI was a genuine Bach.

content.text: Source: New York Times
content.html: Source: New York Times

content.text: Project Baseline
Project Baseline is an initiative to make it easy for everyone to contribute to the map of human health and to participate in clinical research.
content.html: Project Baseline is an initiative to make it easy for everyone to contribute to the map of human health and to participate in clinical research.

content.text: In Project Baseline, researchers, clinicians, engineers, designers, advocates, and volunteers, can collaborate building the next generation of healthcare tools and services.
content.html: In Project Baseline, researchers, clinicians, engineers, designers, advocates, and volunteers, can collaborate building the next generation of healthcare tools and services.

content.text: Data Scientists
Data Scientists can be experts in multiple disciplines:
content.html: Data Scientists can be experts in multiple disciplines:

content.text: Data Scientists also have significant big data experience:
content.html: Data Scientists also have significant big data experience:

content.text: Artificial Intelligence is a scientific discipline embracing several Data Science fields ranging from narrow AI to strong AI, including machine learning, deep learning, big data and data mining.
content.html: Artificial Intelligence is a scientific discipline embracing several Data Science fields ranging from narrow AI to strong AI, including machine learning, deep learning, big data and data mining.

content.text: Artificial Health Intelligence
The Corona Pandemic pushed the need for optimizing Medical Healthcare .
content.html: The Corona Pandemic pushed the need for optimizing Medical Healthcare.

content.text: Machine learning is a new technology that can provide better drug discovery, shorter development time, and lower drug costs.
content.html: Machine learning is a new technology that can provide better drug discovery, shorter development time, and lower drug costs.

content.text: Machine Learning enables healthcare to use "big data" for making better medical or clinical decisions.
content.html: Machine Learning enables healthcare to use "big data" for making better medical or clinical decisions.

content.text: FDA Statement
Statement from FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb, M.D. on steps toward a new, tailored review framework for artificial intelligence-based medical devices:
content.html: Statement from FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb, M.D. on steps toward a new, tailored review framework for artificial intelligence-based medical devices:

content.text: "Artificial intelligence and machine learning have the potential to fundamentally transform the delivery of health care. As technology and science advance, we can expect to see earlier disease detection, more accurate diagnosis, more targeted therapies and significant improvements in personalized medicine".
content.html: "Artificial intelligence and machine learning have the potential to fundamentally transform the delivery of health care. As technology and science advance, we can expect to see earlier disease detection, more accurate diagnosis, more targeted therapies and significant improvements in personalized medicine".
